snippet.title: Zexion Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Announcing Zexion! This sci-fi action-adventure is coming out early 2025! 
Check it out and Wishlist it on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3392510/Zexion/
#gameannouncement #gametrailers #gaming #metroidvania #actionadventuregame #sidescroller #runandgun
